metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28834 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Kramdown before 2.3.1 does not restrict Rouge formatters to the Rouge::Formatters namespace, and thus arbitrary classes can be instantiated.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28834` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

kramdown - 2.3.1-4
ruby-kramdown - 2.3.1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-kramdown package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-4').
